overview: An officer from the North penetrated to the South to operate. Exposed and hunted, he fled into the barrel car of a son of the mayor. Accident, car fire, the mayor's son is dead. The father back the wrong man officers with his child, because two youth in this capital the same from the face to the physique. Living next to the mayor, the officials gradually turned by the morality and kindness of him.
title: The Good Earth
